column5: Would you like a tailor-made programme in Biology? Specialize in mathematical modelling and computational biology to be applied in various biology research domains?Or would you like to design your programme at the crossroad of different biology domains? If so, Biology in Groningen is the master's degree programme for you.Students with a broad interest in biology are able to design a tailor-made programme under the guidance of a staff member who will coach the student throughout his or her master's programme.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
